purpose.name: Cugel the Clever
purpose.description: Self-styled cunning rogue; actually a selfish, cowardly sociopath whose schemes perpetually backfire
purpose.storyFunction: Picaresque anti-hero; satirical vehicle for human pretension
purpose.heroComparison: Inverts heroic convention; selfish where heroes are selfless
purpose.mystery: Gap between self-image as sophisticate and reality as petty sociopath

characterArc.changeDescription: Remains static; repeats cycles of greed and failure

believe.earlyHumanityMoment: Comically inflated self-regard and indignant reactions to being cheated
believe.publicIdentity: Man of discernment, taste, and superior intellect
believe.hiddenInteriorSelf: Impulsive, naive, far less clever than he believes
believe.primaryMotivation: Return home and exact revenge on Iucounu

care.selfRevelation: None; learns nothing, which is the thematic statement
care.falsePhilosophy: His cleverness makes him superior and entitled to exploit others
care.falseGoal: Accumulating wealth and status along the journey
care.specificDesireLine: Return to Almery and destroy Iucounu

opponent.name: Iucounu the Laughing Magician
opponent.sharedGoal: Power and dominance over the other
opponent.exploitsWeakness: Genuinely clever where Cugel only pretends
opponent.moralConflict: None; both amoral; pure contest of cunning
